im.aries.seea.eea.appendix.examplecitation:
**Definitions of countries and assignment of territories**

The ARIES for SEEA Explorer bridges statistical and geospatial domains which poses certain challenges. When classifying countries and areas, the M49 “Standard country or area codes for statistical use” (https://unstats.un.org/unsd/methodology/m49/) has been followed. Several politically contested territories listed below (Table 1) have been assigned to the noted country in order to attribute all land area on Earth (except Antarctica) to one country (ecosystem accounting area), as required by SEEA.

Table 1. Adjustments made to the original UN M49 vector dataset to assign politically contested territories for accounting purposes.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

| ISO-3alpha code |    Extended name   | M49 code |                                    Adjustments                                   |
| :---------------: | :------------------| :--------: | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|       CHN       |        China       |    156   |                      Taiwan and Aksai Chin as part of China                      |
|       EGY       |        Egypt       |    818   |                         Hala'ib Triangle as part of Egypt                        |
|       IND       |        India       |    356   |               Arunachal Pradesh, Jammu and Kashmir as part of India              |
|       KEN       |        Kenya       |    404   |                          Ilemi Triangle as part of Kenya                         |
|       RUS       | Russian Federation |    643   |                          Kuril Islands as part of Russia                         |
|       SHN       |    Saint Helena    |    654   | Ascencion, Gough, Saint Helena, Tristan da Cunha (UK) all merged as Saint Helena |
|       PSE       | State of Palestine |    275   |                        Gaza, West Bank merged as Palestine                       |
|       SDN       |        Sudan       |    729   |                            Bi'r Tawil as part of Sudan                           |

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The assignment of countries or areas to specific groupings is strictly for statistical purposes and does not imply official endorsement or acceptance by the United Nations. 

In addition, there are a number of boundaries that are under dispute, including: 

- Final boundary between the Republic of Sudan and the Republic of South Sudan has not yet been determined.

-The final status of Jammu and Kashmir has not yet been agreed upon by the parties.

-A dispute exists between the Governments of Argentina and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland concerning sovereignty over the Falkland Islands (Malvinas). 

The user remains responsible for the setting of spatial and temporal context for which ecosystem accounts are compiled.

MaesEtAl2023.examplecitation: Maes, J., Bruzón, A.G., Barredo, J.I. et al. Accounting for forest condition in Europe based on an international statistical standard. Nat Commun 14, 3723. 2023. DOI: 10.1038/s41467-023-39434-0.
